description: Ground floor side/rear (wraparound) extension (following demolition of rear additions); replacement of garage to rear of property; rear roof extension (incorporating two Juliet balconies); alteration to external elevations involving installation of two Juliet balconies to first floor rear elevation, replacement of existing UPVC framed windows with timber framed windows and installation of first floor window to side/north elevation and alteration to front boundary treatment (with installation of brick piers, wall and timber gates).
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers:  Proposed Site & Ground Floor Plan drawing no. PL101, Proposed Ground Floor Plan drawing no. PL102, Proposed Ground Floor Plan (Garage/Outbuilding) drawing no. PL103, Proposed First Floor Plan drawing no. PL104, Proposed Second Floor Plan drawing no. PL105, Proposed Roof Floor Plan drawing no.PL106, Proposed Front & Rear Elevation Plan drawing no. PL107, Proposed Side/South Elevation Plan drawing no.PL108, Proposed Side/North Elevation Plan drawing no.PL109, Proposed Section A-A Plan drawing no. PL110, Proposed Garage Elevation Plan 1drawing no.PL111, Proposed Garage Elevation Plan 2 drawing no. PL112 and Existing and Proposed Front Boundary Wall drawing no. PL113
REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
| All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and the Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

REASON:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policy 7.B of the Development Management, Development Plan Document (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policy D3 of the London Plan (2021); and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12.

| The proposed detached replacement rear garage shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the development hereby approved, and shall not be used for habitable accommodation, as an independent dwelling or any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 & D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) - section 12.
| No new openings to the extension hereby approved shall be incorporated without prior written confirmation from the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12, policy D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 , 2.1, 3.1(b) and 3.8 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012

| The proposed flank first floor window (northern elevation facing no.4 Denbigh Road) shall contain only obscure glass and only have top openings at a minimum of 1.7m from floor level and remain in perpetuity.

REASON: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies D1 and D3 of the London Plan 2021, policies 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
